sections.title: Vates (Chronicler Archetype) (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Vates (Chronicler Archetype) class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Spellcasting (Vates (Chronicler Archetype))
sections.description: At even-numbered levels, the vates advances spellcasting in a previous divine spellcasting class, gaining spells per day and known but no other class features.

sections.title: Holy Narrator (Vates (Chronicler Archetype))
sections.description: Vates levels stack with oracle levels for revelation effects, and the vates can use Spellsong feat to cast oracle spells as if they were bard spells.

sections.title: The Way to Follow (Ex) (Vates (Chronicler Archetype))
sections.description: When using Spellsong to cast mystery spells, the vates uses her character level as caster level for duration and effects.
